segments.advisor_message: So, uh, can you tell me about your place? Like do you own it or are you renting?
segments.client_message: Oh, right, um.. I own my, uh, place. It's in, um, Stafford, ya know?

segments.advisor_message: Got it, Stafford. And what's the, um, postal code there?

segments.advisor_message: Thanks, so uh, let's move on. Can you give me the street name and, like, the house name or number? Also, when did you, um, move in?
segments.client_message: Sure! It's, um, 23 Green Lane and I moved in, um, last year. Like, I think it was in April.
